item.title: PILGRIMS PRIDE CORP 10-K
item.description: PILGRIMS PRIDE CORP, which is in the Poultry Slaughtering And Processing [2015] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 09, 2023 had 36040 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 470 instances u - 412 instances 2022 - 325 instances december - 305 instances financial - 279 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
